unnormalised: Arrey bhai, my PNR no. is always unconfirmed, must be my bad luck or IRCTC's algorithm having a laugh at my expense! Maybe I should just travel with a fake ID, like Bond...James Bond, Agent 00-Ticket.
normalised: Arrey bhai, my P-N-R number is always unconfirmed, must be my bad luck or I-R-C-T-C's algorithm having a laugh at my expense! Maybe I should just travel with a fake I-D, like Bond...James Bond, Agent double-zero-Ticket.
